metadata.name: Cryptorunner #1
metadata.description:
Genesis Cryptorunners are Hackers that fight against the Big 5 Corporations of the [2112.run](http://2112.run) universe. The collection is divided into 5 Factions: The Punks, The Makers, The Guild, The Cyphers and The Stray Dogs. 

The faction of the minted NFT is random and each piece has a unique hand-painted style never seen before in NFT projects.

This collection is the key to the entire 2112.run universe, and with it you will be able to:

- Play the game that will come out in March, in which you will hack into corporate servers and earn $DATA tokens.

- Validate your NFT on Discord and participate in the holders section and giveaways.

- Take part in immersive roleplaying Discord Events with prizes.
